body.name: MEIMOUSE-Hidden Camera Detectors, Camera Detector, Bug and Hidden Camera Detector, Hidden Camera Detector, RF Wireless Signal Scanner for Home Office Travel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 16 mins
features: 【Upgraded Smart Chip&User Friendly Operations】Device to find hidden camera ,designed with the advanced smart chip,is more technical in every function,but easier in using. Following the instructions step by step,this hidden camera finder will be a considerate helper for you.

【Professional Anti-spy Detector】1. Magnetic Field Detection to find the unwanted widely used magnetized GPS trackers. 2. Camera Lens Finder&Camera Detector to spot the hidden pinhole camera by a simple visual inspection via infrared laser scanning. 3. RF Signal Detection to detect active RF bug transmitters like transmitting camera,GPS tracker,wireless audio bug. 4.Flashlight, no more worries even in dark environment.

【Wide Frequency Range】 The detection frequency range is 1MHZ~6.5GHZ; Is able to detect modern communications, including GSM, 3G, 4G, 5G, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi 2.4G and 5.8G； 2 working modes: Sound and Vibration. 5-Levels adjustable threshold,Large range of frequency detection.

【Portable & Easy to Use】With the antenna completely concealed inside this anti spy camera detector, the size is so small. It's very easy to carry. And you can conduct a covert sweep, especially when sweeping in sensitive areas that have hidden spy cameras.It is convenient to protect your personal privacy and business information security.
【Quality Service】MEIMOUSE's technical support team takes 7*24 online service, you can contact us with any questions and we will provide you with satisfactory solutions within 24 hours.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 10 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Key Features: Multi-function detectors and detection objects include wireless spy cameras, eavesdroppers, pinhole cameras (for espionage, voyeurism, etc.), GPS trackers, etc.Ultra-wide and ultra-sensitive detection range from 1 MHz to 6.5 GHz, and signal detection range of 5cm to 8m. 5 levels of sensitivity can detect radio waves, 2G, 3G, and 4G mobile signals, and SIM card bugs.The simple design gives user convenience. The function toggle button adjusts the function, and the signal enhancement adjustment button adjusts the detector sensitivity.Ultra-long standby time lithium battery, charging one hour, standby 25 hours, to protect the detector work quality.Comprehensive privacy protection: Help eliminate all the potential hidden dangers around you and keep your family living in a safe environment.

Product Key Functions: The device uses US military technology and exclusively develops various market-oriented bugs, car trackers, mobile phone undercover software, wireless pinhole cameras, surveillance cameras, casino fraud and cheating equipment, and other products.RF signal detector: Adjust the detection range by adjusting the sensitivity of the device, so as to accurately find the location of wireless cameras, eavesdroppers, and other offending devices. The Eavesdropping Device Finder can find SIM card (2G, 3 G, 4G, 5G) bugs, GSM listening devices, etc. (Supports Silent Vibration Mode )Detect hidden camera: Observe the environment scanned by the infrared laser through the special filter that comes with the device, thus discovering hidden cameras that are filming. It can detect 1.2GHz/2.4GHz/5.8GHz wireless hidden cameras, pinhole cameras, spy cameras, IP cameras, webcams, monitors, microphones, eavesdropping devices, and surveillance devices.GPS magnetic field detection: GPS detectors can detect magnetic suction positioners, standby magnetic locators, and GPS with magnetic field sensors. It can also detect intense radio signal radiation around environments. (Supports Silent Vibration Mode )

Magnetic Detection After power on, short press the Mode Button to switch to the green light on for Magnetic field signal detection. Then handheld device slowly scan the suspicious area, it is recommended to open the 5-level signal strength search, and then slowly turn down the signal strength to confirm the location of the signal source after the magnetic signal is detected. RF Detection After power on the default RF detection mode, short press the Mode Button until the blue light is on can also be switched to RF detection mode. Then handheld device slowly scan the suspicious area, it is recommended to open the 5-level signal strength search, and then slowly turn down the signal strength to confirm the location of the signal source after the RF signal is detected. Camera Detection Short press the Mode Button to switch to the red LED light, the signal strength button can adjust the LED light flashing frequency, please try to detect in a dark environment. Eyes through a special filter to observe the suspicious reflective point, and then close to confirm whether the suspicious device is a camera .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been doing a lot of business traveling recently, wanted to get some sort of buggy detection device to ensure that when I'm having safe meetings in hotels.This small gadget works out pretty well. Has 3 main modes, detection of radio waves, hidden cameras and a GPS magnetic field. Tested it with my personal PC & laptop with transmission sources, it beeped really loud when I'm in a conference with my headphones on. The infrared light is very bright, guess it would show some sort of reflection if there is indeed a hidden camera. Can't speak for the GPS as I'm not familiar with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for me.
reviews.reviewText: This product does not work. I have even tried testing it. It does not recognize any devices around my home so I am sure it would not find any hidden device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product and have been very pleased with it. It alerts you proper away when there's something hidden within the room. I like that it is glossy, small, and easy to travel with. The battery lasts a long time as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Could not detect a camera from one inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received it this morning. I immediately tested it around my house. It detects cameras in the room well. I like that it's easy to carry for when I travel and looking forward to use it for checking the rooms and airbnbs my family will stay in.
